name: .P3 File Extension
summary: Learn about .P3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project scheduling file created by Primavera P3, a project planning software often used for construction projects; saves the tasks, timeline, and resources for completing a project; allows the project manager to plan and track progress.

content: Primavera P3 was developed by Primavera Systems, who was acquired by Oracle in 2006. Primavera P6, Oracle's continuation of the Primavera software, uses the .XER extension for projects. P3 projects can still be opened in Primavera P6 by choosing File â†’ Import from the application menu.
NOTE: Oracle discontinued support for Primavera P3 on December 31, 2010.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
